comments.html: Why are you so pessimistic in your last sentence? On which facts is your prediction based on? I think I have to take the blue pills instead of the red ones.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
There is definitely some humour in this paper. I like the concluding remarks.

A former CIO I reported to always said "some resources don't know what they don't know". I'm not sure if she knew about the Dunning-Kruger Efect or not, but that's exactly what she was describing.

I've found the following article enjoyable to read and have visited it more than once over the past couple of years. http://thefederalist.com/2014/01/17/the-death-of-expertise/
comments.name: Bruno Wollmann
